attributes.action: read this petition and lets get our kids off the streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this country cares more for its councials and leaders ,the youth of today are a bad lot but we all have played a big part in the crime, we give these kids no chance to prove themselfs we give them no were to go only the streets , all enquires fall on deaf ears and so the kids feel shuned by family,schools,and comunitys lets get them off the streets and give them things to do ,not 5to9 painting and meeting places but car maintanace, m.c things that they would likes to do bryor rd has gangs og kids but the bryor center is filled with kids doing there stuff  dont reject these kids get 20 of the street and the rest will follow invite them in to the comunity dont leave them on the edge

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
